description: Try our easy to follow White Choc Chip Pancakes With Dark Chocolate Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: White Choc Chip Pancakes With Dark Chocolate Sauce
name: White Choc Chip Pancakes With Dark Chocolate Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stack pancakes onto plates and serve topped with a scoop of ice-cream and drizzled with chocolate sauce.
